data.title: Why do people always jokingly call Suga "savage" when he's just being straightforward and honest?
data.meta_description: Answer: MY OPINION but exactly. To be honest it's getting sort of annoying. Army everywhere going, “OMG SUGA SO SAVAGE” and savage that and savage this. I feel like that's what everyone sees in Yoongi. The badass, hardcore, savage rapper who doesn't care. Don't get me wrong, Yoongi IS a talented ...
